title: Handle Property Damage Caused by a Tenant
description: A tenant causes significant damage to a property that exceeds their security deposit (e.g., breaks a window).

tasks.description: Document the damage with photos and get a quote for the repair.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has evidence of the damage and its cost.

tasks.description: Send a formal notice to the tenant, demanding payment for the repair cost, citing the relevant clause in their lease.
tasks.expected_outcome: The tenant is formally notified of their financial responsibility.

tasks.description: If the tenant refuses to pay, file a claim in small claims court or with a collections agency to recover the costs.
tasks.expected_outcome: Formal collection or legal action is initiated.
